direction.raw_text: I remember the summer after my mother passed was the first year they had the Monopoly game at McDonald's. I musta come here three times a day trying to collect all the game pieces. Packed on 20 pounds, got acne from all the grease. The Major said I was the fattest, ugliest 13-year-old he ever laid eyes on. But I didn't care, I just wanted to win the money and get the fuck out of there. So, one night, I followed this skinny register kid home, jumped him. I kept whaling on him, asking him where they were hiding the Park Place piece. The million dollar prize. But he didn't know shit. A year later, The Major won the lotto. I asked him for a Sega Genesis. He bought me one of those paddles with the ball attached.

direction.raw_text: Are we? Would you do anything to protect me, my money, my empire?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, sure... (NERVOUS) I mean, like what kinda stuff are we talking about? Dwayne takes out his cell, keys in the speed dial code and slides the cell across the table to Jay.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Would you push the button?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why would you want me to do that?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's just a question, Jay. Would you? If I asked you? (MORE)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I mean, it's no different than those watermelons.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Watermelons aren't alive.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, they are. Not the ones you blew up, though. Dwayne stares hard at Jay. A tense beat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No one gets hurt...right, Dwayne?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, yeah. I forgot about that part. Dwayne cracks a smile.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Anyway, he hasn't even made the drop yet. I'm gonna go take a shit. Stay away from the bathroom. Someone could get hurt. Dwayne heads off. Jay eyes the cell phone he has left behind.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Weeds have overtaken the abandoned place. Will leans against his parked car, waiting. Chet is nowhere to be seen. Will spots Vaughn's Sentra approach. It pulls into the station and Vaughn steps. He could not look more menacing. Juicy hangs back in the passenger seat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where are the other guys?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm the only guy. (BEAT) You got it? Will picks up the garbage bag at his feet and walks it over to Vaughn. He opens it, looks in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What the fuck did you do...rob a bank?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes. Vaughn grins.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now where's the code?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't have any code. Vaughn turns to leave. Will grabs his arm. Vaughn stops, looks purposefully down at Will's hand. Will draws back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Listen, man, I just want the code.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know what the fuck you're talking about.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The code for the fucking bomb! Will opens his jacket. Vaughn takes a sudden step back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What kind of stupid motherfucker wears a bomb to a drop?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Your boss put this on me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I am my boss.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Then give me the code!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Motherfucker, I don't know no goddamn code. Whoever told you I did, lied to you. Now step the fuck off, or I'll shoot you in the face so you don't explode and mess up my boots. Vaughn goes to leave again. Will runs ahead of him and gets in his way.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If you don't have the code, I want that money back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The only way you're getting this money back is if you kill me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You don't know what I've gone through for that money! In an instant, Vaughn has his gun out, aimed at Will's head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do I look sympathetic? Now step the fuck aside.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Juicy looks on with interest as Vaughn holds Will at gunpoint. Then she spots
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Chet creeping up behind Vaughn, from wherever he was hiding, clutching a large metal pipe. Juicy jumps out of the Sentra.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Vaughn, look out! Vaughn whirls around toward Chet, just in time to have his gun arm smashed by the pipe. The weapon drops from his hand. Chet takes another swing, cracking Vaughn across the face. He howls, blood spraying, and topples over. Chet goes for another swing, when - Juicy jumps on him, wildly biting and clawing. Will grabs the back of Juicy's track jacket for leverage and flings her away. She hits the back of the Sentra and careens clear across the trunk.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let's go! Will grabs the money. Chet kicks Vaughn's gun into the bushes. The guys break for the Mustang and get in. Juicy gets to her feet, runs right by a dazed Vaughn and after the car, which pulls out into the road and leaves her behind, screaming and cursing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: DAY - MOVING Will's mind is racing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What the fuck was that?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They tried to screw us. You're a liability. They were just gonna let you blow up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not with the money they won't.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A tidy space, filled with various half-finished devices, action figures and heavy metal posters. A low mechanical hum registers. Dwayne sits on a stool in the center of the garage, while Jay carefully trims his hair with an electric clipper. Dwayne holds up a mirror to check out his work.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Never comes out this nice when I do it myself. You might wanna take some more off the top, though. I wanna look real professional when I go down to the morgue to identify the body. Dwayne's phone chimes from a nearby counter. He grabs it, looks at the incoming number, slightly concerned. He answers -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You drop the money yet?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: DAY - MOVING Will yells into the phone -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No! I've still got the money! And I cracked your friend's face open!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) Why the fuck would you do that!?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You lied! You said I'd get the code! Dwayne is panicked, covers badly -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I gave him the code. He told me he committed it to memory. (MORE)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He was probably just embarrassed that he forgot it. I'll call him up and -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) You didn't give him shit! I want the code now or you'll never see this money!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hold on there, big man. You got a bomb on you. I got a cell phone that detonates it. You're not exactly negotiating from a position of leverage.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) I'm holding the money. I blow up, and it blows up. Who has the leverage now? Go ahead and push the button, you idiot. Chet freaks out -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't tell him to push the button! Pull over! Pull over! Dwayne is getting pissed off.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why don't you watch what the fuck you say! I own you! I tell you to rob a bank, and you rob a bank. I tell you to give me the money, and you give me the goddamn money and hope I show you some mercy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) I'm tired of this bullshit. I'm already dead, right? So fuck you. At least I'll die rich. I can't say the same for you. The line goes dead. Dwayne tears off his haircut smock.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That piece of shit hung up on me!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: DAY - MOVING Chet grabs the wheel and forces Will to pull over.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Get me out of this car!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Chet jumps out while the Mustang is still slowing down. He runs 20 yards away. Will turns the car off and gets out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That was colossally stupid!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It was a negotiation tactic. He'll call back and I won't answer. Then he'll call back and I will answer, and he'll realize the only way he gets the money is if he gives me the code.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sure! That seems like a perfectly logical pattern of thought! I bet that's exactly what he'll do!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dwayne tries Will's phone again. It goes to voicemail. He explodes like a pack of Mentos in a two-liter of Diet Coke. Throws his cell across the room. Overturns a work table.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Does this guy know who the fuck I am!? Jay retreats into a corner. Dwayne's a big boy, and he soon tires himself out, hunches over, panting.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dwayne...you never told me you weren't going to give him the code.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We're not amateurs. He was a loose end. I let him live, someday I woulda been walking out of my mansion and... bam! FBI, CIA, NSA, all converging on my front lawn, 'cause a loose end turned state's evidence and they got what they need to put me away. Dwayne shakes his head. Starts digging through the mess he's made...finds his phone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fuck it, Jay. I'll just kill The Major myself. Dwayne keys in the speed dial code.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't do it. Dwayne looks down at the send button.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You know what they say about a tree falling in the forest? Maybe the same thing applies to blowing up some motherfucker across town. Maybe it doesn't even make a sound. Dwayne hits send.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Boom. But Dwayne notices something...the phone in his hand is ringing. He puts it to his ear. The line connects -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) Hello...who is this...hello...? Dwayne snaps the phone shut, looks to Jay, who tries to will the beads of sweat back into his pores.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who did I just call, Jay? 'Cause she sounded cute for a bomb.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gina Kim. My seventh grade crush. Or whoever lives in Gina Kim's house now.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where's the number for the bomb?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: In my head. I switched it out of your phone while you were taking a shit. You're out of control, Dwayne.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm in perfect control! Dwayne charges Jay. Jay holds up the hair clippers like a weapon, flicks them on. Dwayne rips the cord out of the wall, uses it to yank the clippers from Jay's hand, then whips him with the cord.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stop it!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Dwayne goes to whip Jay again, but Jay moves like a jack rabbit and delivers a fierce kidney shot. Dwayne stumbles backward, falls onto the couch, groans -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You asshole...I make you my partner and you pull this shit...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm tired of you pushing me around all the time! What kinda partner does that!?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fuck you...I'm gonna piss blood, aren't I?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's what it said on the internet. Dwayne's phone rings in his pocket.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Go on. Get it out for me. I can barely move. Jay pulls the cell from Dwayne's pocket...opens it and puts it to his ear so he can answer -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Glad you came to your senses.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Vaughn has a rag pressed to his swollen, bloody face. Juicy is nearby, banged up and dirty. Vaughn yells into his cell -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who the fuck do you think you're talking to!?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) I honestly don't know.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let me give you a hint: your boy just jumped me, tossed my bitch like a rag doll and split with the cash. Dwayne realizes who's on the other line, recovers -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That guy's not my boy. He's a dick. I'm sorry for all the, uh, confusion.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) Confusion? The only motherfucker that's confused is you. Apparently, you think you can fuck me and survive the day.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I wasn't fucking you, I was fucking him. You gotta understand, you're like a pawn in a much larger game I'm playing here.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) Did you just call me a pawn, you stupid fuck!?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I didn't mean it like that. I'm just juggling a whole lot of shit.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) I want my money. Right now.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That may not be possible. (DELICATELY) I just want to put this out there, to keep you in the loop...but I may need to bump the hit. Vaughn paces, furious.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This isn't a reservation at Sizzler! You don't "bump" it! I want you to bring me my money right now, to where I am standing in this shit hole town, bleeding from the motherfucking face!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) I don't exactly have the money...give me some time and -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The deal's off! You just became the hit! Vaughn hangs up, tosses the bloody rag to the ground and screams in frustration.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He lives with his daddy. You already got the address.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dwayne looks down at his phone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's it. The assassin's gonna kill me now. I'm gonna die. Game fucking over. Dwayne cradles his arms around his wounded kidney, rocks back and forth, wallowing in defeat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We can still get him the money. Try the pizza guy back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why? So he can fuck around again, and I wind up dead, anyway? No. I'd rather just sit here. I want to die right here on this couch.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. We're gonna get that money. Just like we planned. All we gotta do is get the leverage back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How do we do that? Pizza boy's obviously got some kinda death wish. Jay gathers his resolve.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We take the girl. The one he went to see. Then he won't try shit. Dwayne looks up at Jay with something not unlike awe.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's actually...that's a great fucking idea, Jay. It's the best idea anyone's had all day. Dwayne lowers his head. He removes the gun from his belt...holds it out to Jay. Jay takes it. Feels its weight. Then offers it back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I was just trying to figure out how you would do it, Dwayne. Dwayne takes the gun. Struggles to stand. Jay helps him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ok. Then let's do it right. We leave nothing to chance. Because if we go to prison for this, I won't be able to watch out for you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ok, Dwayne. Dwayne looks over at a frame backpack hanging from a hook on the wall. PVC piping bulges from it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You should probably bring the flamethrower, buddy. There's gonna be some evidence to dispose of.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Will and Chet sit on the ground, still 20 yards apart. Chet checks his watch.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's been half an hour.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He'll call.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: In another 30 minutes I'm calling the bomb squad. Chet gestures to the vast emptiness all around them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: These guys obviously aren't watching you anymore.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You know, even if they get the bomb squad here in time, and they can somehow get this thing off me, we still gotta answer for the robbery.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll take the heat with you, Will.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nah. I'll tell them I forced you into it. That you didn't have a choice.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thanks, man.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Will looks at Chet for a beat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's it? You're not gonna think about it a little longer? After all we went through...tear down the relationship, rebuild it...you're gonna let me go to prison alone?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You offered.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It was a test. Your grade: F minus. You know what the "F" is for?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: To fuck myself?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You passed that test. Failed the important one. As the guys continue to argue -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : 1 hour, 28 minutes...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Kate walks down a hallway, turns into an office. Two figures rush past from the intersecting hallway and duck behind a corner. Kate emerges from the office and continues into
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Kate goes to the mirror, checks herself out. She's been crying. She splashes water on her face, then enters a stall. The bathroom door opens and Dwayne and Jay enter. Dwayne pulls something hairy from his pocket. Inside the stall, Kate reaches for some toilet paper...from underneath the barrier, she notices two pairs of dirty, masculine sneakers. Her breath goes shallow. She takes out her cell, quietly opens it. She presses the first 9 in "911," but her keypad volume is on and the phone makes a dull, electronic beep that echoes in the quiet bathroom.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) Why don't you just slide the phone under the door, so I don't have to kick it open and see you with your panties down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Kate slides the phone out. One of the sneakers crushes it. She gets off the toilet, arranges her clothing and steps out out of the stall. She gasps at - The two ominous men standing there in gorilla masks. Dwayne's gun is plainly visible, tucked into the front of his pants.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's the quietest way out of the building? 'Cause I might get excited in a confrontation, and you might wind up shot in the face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Major is watching reruns of Three's Company. He doesn't laugh or remotely smile at any of it. The subtle click of a door opening does not escape his finely tuned senses.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dwayne? Nothing. The Major gets up and goes to a desk, rifles through a drawer and pulls something out. A simple pen. He clutches it like a weapon.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Major creeps along.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) Just stay where you are, old man. The Major turns to find Vaughn pointing a gun at him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm looking for your son.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Even if I knew where he was, I wouldn't tell you nothing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't be stupid.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You know, I saved a black man's life in the shit. So if I took yours I'd be even.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I see where your son gets his common sense. (MORE)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But you might want to readjust your attitude, because I ain't fucking around. I want Dwayne. I don't know why you'd want to protect him, the motherfucker hired me to kill you. If this news has any effect at all on The Major, he doesn't show it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Just tell me where he is! Vaughn pulls back the hammer of his gun.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You think I'm scared of death? There's a whole generation of gooks that think I'm the grim reaper. Vaughn shakes his head. Almost imperceptibly, The Major repositions the hand with the pen in it. Vaughn is about to squeeze the trigger - But The Major beats him to it, clicking the pen, which is actually a pen gun. It fires a .22 caliber round into Vaughn's neck. He drops the gun and clutches the geyser of blood. The Major charges Vaughn, jumps on him and wrestles him to the ground, trying to jam the pen into the wound in his neck.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll ride you all the way to hell! I know exactly how to get there! Vaughn reaches for his gun. His fingers curl around it and he whips it across The Major's face, knocking him backwards. Vaughn scrambles to his feet, gun pointed at the felled Major.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What now, old man!? You can't kill me! None of y'all can kill me! The Major looks up at Vaughn, once again face to face with a loaded weapon.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Go on and -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! The Major goes limp, one searing hole in his chest.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Vaughn clasps a hand to his neck to staunch the flow of blood. He steps over the The Major's body and continues upstairs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Vaughn rifles through the cabinets, dumps all of the first aid supplies into the sink. He gets to work on his wound.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The locked door is kicked open. Vaughn, neck crudely bandaged, flicks on the lights and looks around the childish room. Chinese Fighting Fish swim in a large tank, seem to stop and look out at him like guard dogs. Vaughn ransacks the place. He finds a desk drawer locked. Takes out his gun and blows it open. Vaughn pulls a stuffed file folder out of the drawer. Flips through it. It's full of details about Dwayne's plan, the tanning salon, etc.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Motherfucker has lost his mind... He finds a map of the town in the file. Three locations are highlighted: the bank, the boarded up gas station, and the radio tower. PUSH IN on the radio tower. Vaughn stuffs the map into his pocket. He stops before leaving the room, turns and shatters the fish tank with the butt of his gun. Water spills out and the Chinese Fighting Fish flop onto the floor. As Vaughn lifts a boot to stomp them -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Will and Chet are still arguing -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Look at the upshot, while you're behind bars you can finally finish your degree. If I was there, too, it would just be a distraction.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Great idea, Chet. Thanks a lot. I'll just sit here and figure out a fucking major. Will stews. After a beat, his hand goes to his pocket. It's vibrating. He pulls out his cell.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, it's them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Will answers -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You ready to talk now?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: DAY - MOVING Dwayne drives with his cell pressed to his ear. Jay keeps watch on Kate in back. She is blindfolded, hands bound behind her back with duct tape.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, I'm ready to talk. I want my money. Meet me back at the radio tower in 50 minutes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) I've barely got an hour left!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's the point. I want you on a short leash.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) Fuck that. Give me the code first. Then you can have your money. You'll just have to trust me when I say that I don't want it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, I'm sure. You just wanna go back to your fantastic life. Your great job. And that blonde bitch with the sexy voice. Will's mind jumps to the only logical conclusion. Roller coaster stomach drop. His voice cracks as he asks a useless
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What the fuck is that supposed to mean?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) It means that girl you paid a visit to today is sitting in the back of my van right now. And it ain't exactly consensual.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fuck you! You crossed a line!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Dwayne just laughs, maniacally.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There are no lines! There's just me and you and 100 thousand dollars. Once we get that shit in order, you can have her back, and your life, too. So you're gonna show up where I say, when I say. Alone. And if you try anything stupid, the two of you will be delivering pizzas to Saint Peter.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let me talk to her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You got ten seconds. Dwayne hands the phone back to Jay, who puts it to Kate's ear. She is trembling.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Will...?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) Kate, I'm so sorry.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's okay...I'm fine...I'm just really - Dwayne snatches the phone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She's just really gonna die if you fuck this up. Will absorbs this like a blow to the chest. The line disconnects.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fuck!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What happened?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They have Kate.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What the fuck does that mean!?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They took her, man. They must have followed us to her office.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Damn it! You had to go see her!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm sorry. I messed up...I finally messed up worse than I could have possibly imagined.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We gotta get her back, Will. These guys are crazy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We still got the money. As long as we have that, she's alive. Come on. Chet grabs the bag of cash. They hustle into the car and it peels out, leaving behind a swirling cloud of dust. As the sun begins to set -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : 58 minutes...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Two menacing headlights come at us on the empty road. They
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . SENTRA - NIGHT - MOVING Vaughn holds up Dwayne's map as he drives. He seems to be on the right road, headed for the radio tower. He crumples the map and throws it in back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Mustang stops by the gate to the radio tower. Chet jumps out and disappears into the bushes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Mustang pulls up. Will gets out and looks around the deserted place. He holds up the money bag.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm here! In the shadow of the nearby shed, the minivan is revealed as its interior lights come on. The door opens and Dwayne emerges, in his mask.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How much time you got left?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Will takes off the jacket and tosses it to the ground. He looks at the timer.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ten minutes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Damn. Maybe we should just wait around for the money shot. The guys meet in a clearing. Dwayne nods at the bag.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That the money?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Maybe. Where's the girl? Dwayne grins.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: In the van. Maybe.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Get her out here. You're wasting time. Will grips the bag close to him. Dwayne whistles. The minivan door opens and Jay steps out. Strapped to his back is the frame pack we saw at his workshop. A long tube connects the pack to the handle of a metal pipe- like device in his hand. Jay helps Kate, still bound and blindfolded, out of the van. They approach Dwayne and take up position behind him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Will, are you there?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm here. It's gonna be okay.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is a fucking tearjerker.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Just let her come over here.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I will. But you should know, my associate over there is packing a flamethrower. Jay aims the metal device he has been holding. He hits a button and a pilot light comes on.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Just do what we say. Don't mess around or anything.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Unless either of you can outrun a 25- foot flame. (gestures to gun in his belt) Or a bullet. Dwayne roughly pulls Kate away from Jay and shoves her forward. Will grabs her, pulls her blindfold off and pushes her behind him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Get back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I gave you the girl. Now give me the money.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How about we get the code out of the way first, since this bomb happens to be ticking so close to all of us.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fair enough. Dwayne pulls a slip of paper from his pocket.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You ready to be a free man?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Just give it to me!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Will keys in the numbers. The timer freezes and the lock at the hinge opens. Will carefully extricates himself from the vest. He lays it down on the ground and steps away from it. His shirt is drenched in sweat from where the bomb sat. Will takes a final look at the money bag, then throws it to Dwayne. He looks inside, smiles. Jay takes a peak.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's so fucking pretty, ain't it?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah. It's awesome.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Dwayne looks up at Will.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay, you can get out of here now.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I actually have this sneaking suspicion that once we turn around, you're gonna put a bullet in both of our backs - and this is just a guess - burn our bodies.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They say great minds think alike. And in this case, so do we.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I figured as much. That's why I got a gun pointed at you, too. (LOUDLY) I got a sniper in the bushes locked on you right now.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do I look that dumb?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I can't tell, you're wearing a mask. Before Dwayne can react, he stops and blinks, something shining in his eyes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey...on your forehead. Dwayne's eyes turn upward, just barely making out the red dot that dances on his forehead.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Son of a bitch. Well played. In the bushes, hidden from sight, Chet carefully aims his laser pointer at Dwayne's forehead. Will grins at Dwayne.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We're gonna walk out of here now. If you shoot, my sniper shoots. I can't guarantee he'll get both of you. But he'll definitely get you. As Will turns away - 100.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) Hold the fuck up. Vaughn emerges from the darkness. He looks at Will.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wasn't expecting to see you here. Without warning, Vaughn cracks Will over the head with the butt of his gun. He goes down hard. Kate screams. Vaughn points the gun at her and she shuts up. Dwayne steps forward with the bag.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's all good. We got your money.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nice mask, Dwayne. Now throw the money over here. Dwayne complies. As soon as the bag lands, Vaughn aims the gun at him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hold up. You don't have to do this. I just paid you. Kate looks on, terrified, an unconscious Will at her side. Vaughn's eyes burn a hole through Dwayne.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I've been hit with a pipe, shot with a pen, and wasted my whole motherfucking day...all because of you and this job.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know what you're talking about. Just take the money.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I will. And then I'm gonna tie up the two loose ends in the gorilla masks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm not a loose end!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're a fucking idiot. You are as loose as ends get. Panicked, Dwayne's eyes flash over to Jay, who tightens his grip on the flamethrower handle. Jay catches Dwayne's eye. Dwayne nods. Vaughn sees this.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What the - Jay rears up with the flamethrower. Vaughn couldn't be more surprised to see the device Jay is holding spit a massive ball of fire at him. Vaughn dives to the ground, fires off two wild shots, one of
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nails Dwayne in the shoulder, spinning him backward and knocking him off his feet. Kate recoils in horror as: Vaughn scurries madly on the ground, intermittently firing, while Jay screams and tries to torch him with the 25-foot flame. A hand touches Kate's shoulder and she whirls around to find -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Chet!? What are you doing here!?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not now. We gotta take off. (LOOKS AROUND) Where's Will? Kate looks to the empty spot beside her where Will just was. Flames inches from him, Vaughn lines up a desperate shot - Good news: the bullet only grazes Jay's side. Bad news: it keeps going and punches through the flamethrower backpack, which happens to be filled with gasoline, which happens to have an incredibly low flash point. So the spark from, say, a bullet, would cause
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Meanwhile, Will pops up behind Chet and Kate, clutching the garbage bag.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I got the money. Let's get the fuck out of here. They take off toward Will's car. Dwayne groggily comes to...no SOUND, just a ringing. The first thing he sees: Vaughn storming toward him, god-knows- what spewing from his mouth. Vaughn levels his gun - It doesn't make a sound for two reasons. The second being that it's out of bullets. Dwayne fumbles for his own hardware. Muzzle flash.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Vaughn drops to his knees. Pulse snatched from him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: to the tune of Jay's screams. Dwayne looks over to see his friend in flames, flailing his arms and shrieking. Dwayne's head snaps to the other side, where he sees the Mustang's tires peel. He tears off his mask, frantically looks around. The money is gone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No!! Jay disentangles himself from the backpack, the source of the flames, but his clothes are now ablaze. In his frenzy, he somehow manages to string together two coherent words -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dwayne! Help! Dwayne gets to his feet as the Mustang roars down the driveway. He looks to Jay, then to his minivan. Dwayne's face: Two roads diverge in a wood. Which to take?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Goddamn it, Jay! Dwayne sprints over to Jay, rips off his jacket and uses it to beat the flames down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stop, drop and roll! Jay hits the deck. Dwayne continues fighting the flames, finally falls on top of Jay with the jacket spread and smothers the last of them out. Jay looks up at Dwayne with puppy dog eyes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You came back for me...you said you never would.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You didn't hesitate back there, Jay. You did good. Jay smiles. Flames overtake the field all around them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm gonna go put a bullet in that motherfucker and get our money. Think you can get outta here?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah. Go get him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Dwayne hurries toward the minivan. Jay stumbles up to his feet and limps off toward the woods.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Mustang travels away from the rising flames.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: NIGHT - MOVING Will's face is a mess of dirt, sweat and dried blood. He and Chet stare ahead, completely shell-shocked. Kate looks from one of them to the other.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Uh...I just got kidnapped.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, that was totally Will's fault. In case you want to factor that in while you're mulling over the whole relationship thing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm very sorry about the kidnapping. This is me, taking responsibility for it. Growing up. Like a viable life partner.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This man has spied on you in the nude before!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What? No, I didn't.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's lying. He's trying to build a relationship on a foundation of lies. And it won't stand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I just got kidnapped! Can we talk about that!? Something catches Will's attention: a set of headlights rapidly growing larger in the rear-view mirror.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: NIGHT - MOVING Dwayne's speedometer is buried past 100 mph. His eyes burn with intensity.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: NIGHT - MOVING Will hits the gas.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, shit. One of those dudes is definitely not dead! Chet and Kate look out the back window. Chet screams -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hurry up! He's already on us!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dwayne's car pulls even with the Mustang.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: NIGHT - MOVING Will looks over at Dwayne, who pulls out his gun and takes aim. He flashes a sick grin -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I own this town. Before Dwayne can get a shot off -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: An explosion rocks the minivan from inside. The back end is lifted off the ground and the car tumbles over itself. It lands on its roof and skids into a ditch.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: NIGHT - MOVING Chet and Kate watch the burning wreck disappear out the back window. They are equal parts confused and happy to be alive.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What the hell was that?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That was the bomb I carried around all day. I reactivated it and put it in the back of his van. I guess his time was up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: "His time was up?" Were you thinking that up the whole day?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I was prepared, yes. I can't help it if I'm the kind of guy who thinks about the future.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's not that kind of guy. He doesn't think about the future. Ever.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What exactly happened since I saw you this afternoon?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Primarily, we robbed a bank.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What!? So you're, like, fugitives? What do we do now?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, Will. What does the future hold?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nothing good if we stay in town and they pin this on us. Kate, I think you should put in for that vacation time. Right now. If anyone gives you a problem, tell them to fuck off. There's 100 grand in that trash bag by your feet. A third of it's yours. Kate opens the bag...smiles through the dirt and grime.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Will, that's -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fucked up. Why does she get a share?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why do you get a share? Chet stews. Will catches Kate's eyes in the rear-view.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Airport's 30 minutes away. Pick a destination. This time it's not a practice run.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The car zooms off.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : 0 hours, 0 minutes...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wind fans the flames of the burning minivan. The shattered windshield sprouts another crack...then another, as - Dwayne's foot kicks it out. He drags himself from the smoldering steel carcass. He is a charred, blood splattered mess, but he is alive.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dwayne is propped up against a sign, lingering on the edge of consciousness. The headlights of a lone pickup truck approach. Dwayne feebly waves the truck down for a ride.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The door opens and Dwayne stumbles through. He has made it home. He drops like a puppet whose strings have been cut. From where his head has landed on the floor, Dwayne sees something odd...long red streaks. He crawls forward on all fours to investigate... It is a trail of sticky red blood. Dwayne follows it until he comes upon its source...the crumpled body of his father, lying face down. Dwayne's face: shock and confusion and joy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dad? Dwayne inches closer, pokes the body. Nothing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dad, are you - The body emits a low groan. Dwayne rolls it over. His father's face is white, he's lost a lot of blood, but he isn't totally spent yet. He struggles to speak -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dwayne...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What happened to you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Some guy...said you hired him to kill me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dad, I...I'd never...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Look at you...lip quivering like you're getting fucked...be a man.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I am a man! I killed you, didn't I? Now I'm gonna use your money to open a tanning salon where they let you fuck the chicks. This stirs something in The Major.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You mean...like those whorehouses...in 'Nam...I used to tell you about? Dwayne softens at the recollection.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Those were great bedtime stories. The Major nods. Opens his hand. Reveals a cordless phone. Dwayne looks to the bloody streaks down the hall, leading to the phone table. The Major dragged himself the whole way.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Medics are late...probably a couple lazy spicks...you tell 'em I said so...all right, son?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sure thing, pop. The Major looks up at Dwayne's bruised face, as if for the first time.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hell of thing...I think I may...actually respect you now. Dwayne's eyes well up. He reaches out, cradles his father as he expires. It's like a very bloody, white trash version of the Pieta. Dwayne sobs uncontrollably, until - He drops his father and pound-pound-pounds his chest in some approximation of a life saving resuscitation.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Get up, you pussy! Come on, soldier!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: as Dwayne pounds the body and distant sirens grow nearer.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . THE DARKNESS RIPPLES... Into waves. It's the ocean, long past sunset. PULL BACK to find a lone figure staring out at it, sitting on
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Will. Shirtless. Could be anywhere. Chet approaches and sits beside him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fucking nine dollars to use the internet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Police think it was that black guy. They found some kind of map in his car. And I'm sure racial profiling played a part.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But nothing about us?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nope. Guess it's time to head back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I was thinking we'd stick around a little a longer.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why? So you have more time to delude my sister?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes. And it'd be easier if you gave us five fucking minutes alone. Chet stares out at the ocean for a beat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You really think she's into you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I kissed her last night. No tongue. Then you walked in. Chet just nods. Will gets up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're gonna go fuck my sister now, aren't you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll be thinking of you the whole time.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: At the very least...be a considerate lover. Give pleasure, before taking pleasure.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I think I'm reading you. And I will try my best. Will heads up a trail that leads to a hotel bungalow. Kate opens the door, steps out onto the porch. Will stops, looks back at Chet. He whistles. Chet turns.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're Riggs! You always have been! Chet smiles, shakes his head as - Will reaches the porch. He stands close to Kate. His nerves clock overtime.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I lied and told your brother I kissed you. I thought it would make this easier.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Here's an idea: pretend you have a bomb strapped to your chest. Tick,
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Will closes the gap and kisses her. After a beat -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is Chet watching us?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Probably. We should go inside. I promised him I'd satisfy you. Kate laughs, leads him inside and the door shuts to -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . But they are pushed to one side of the screen, as the other side is filled with - A lo-fi, 2001-style light tunnel. It deposits us in the furthest reaches of the galaxy, where we find - A tanning bed. Rotating in orbit. Dwayne's voice booms and
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! The tanning bed explodes, like a star gone supernova. From the light and fire and chaos...emerges a logo:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A bad MATCH CUT takes us to the same logo. Camera ZOOMS OUT unsteadily to reveal it is a banner above a strip mall storefront. We are watching a local commercial with appropriately poor production value.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dwayne walks backward down a hallway while addressing camera and trying not to trip -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Here at Major Tan, our specially trained technicians are hard at work developing new technologies that harness the power of the sun, to ensure a cutting-edge tanning experience. Dwayne enters a tanning room. A man in a lab coat stares down at a clipboard, on which a complicated scientific equation is written.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How's it looking? The man turns: it's Jay. His smiling face is speckled with healing burn wounds.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's our most advanced tanning bed yet! He gestures to a very ordinary looking tanning bed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, don't just take this scientist's word for it. The proof... Dwayne snaps his fingers. A BAD SPECIAL EFFECT makes him disappear, then reappear with a totally orange tan.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...is in the tan. We follow Dwayne back out into the hallway.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But Major Tan isn't just about looking good. It's also about feeling good. Dwayne gestures to another room. The door opens and Juicy saunters out in a bikini. A beat later, a RANDOM GUY exits.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That "Deluxe Tan" was fantastic!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dwayne stands outside the store.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So come on down to Major Tan...where we're proud to be a family business.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...The Major beside Dwayne. He's only about four feet tall now, on account of the wheelchair. But he's grinning like a jackal, in a POW-MIA cap.
direction.name: direction
